page.title: 05WILBERFOSS COMPUTER USE
page.content: A survey was done in schoolto find out about computer use at home. Below are the names of different types of computers and what the owners use them for in the main. 37 out of 150 asked had a computer. Name of computer ZX Spectrum 21.6% Commodore Vic20 16.2% Commodore C16 13.5% Commodore 64 13.5% Acorn Electron 10.8% Sinclair ZX81 8.I% BBC Micro B, Apple, Texas 199, ZX+, Sony MSX, Atari 800A,Oric1 all 2.7% Uses. Games 68.1%,Programmes I5.9% Business 6.8%,Education 6.8% Homework 2.2%. "My favourite game is "Pssssst". The idea is to spray insects that are trying to eat a plant."
